name: mapik/audit-log
description: Flexible and rock solid audit log tracking plugin for CakePHP

suggest.cakephp/elastic-search: The optional persister engine for audit-log is elastic search and requires this plugin
suggest.friendsofcake/process-mq: Use this package if you prefer sending the audit events to RabbitMQ
suggest.friendsofcake/crud: audit-log provide Crud Action classes for displaying audit logs
